It was an ancient belief among the Jews and [[Samaritan|Samaritans]] that both the wisest and most aged among them would grow [[goat|caprine]] horns, which were known literally as the "horns of wisdom" (קרניים חוכמה), hence the ancient Hebrew [[dictum]]:
    −
''From Wisdom's horn
+
''From Wisdom's horn/Authority is born''.
